# Aseguradora

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Visualizar los datos en forma de grafica de una base de datos de una aseguradora
## Installation

You can install the released version of Aseguradora from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("Aseguradora")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(Aseguradora)
## basic example code
tablas(my_data)
```
